reviews.customers_say: Customers find this tunic to be a perfect basic tee with a nice fit that's not too baggy, and appreciate its thickness and sturdiness. Customers describe the material as soft and comfortable, with one noting it works well under sweaters or long jackets.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT LENGTH AND COMFORT
items.body: This tunic pullover top fits very well. The material is soft and of very good quality, but w hat I really like even more, is that there it is slightly longer in the back. I already have several colors and I am looking forward to purchasing more. Read more
items.author: ShopgirlPea

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality
items.body: Fits perfectly. Very comfortable. Actually a thicker material than expected which is great for fall and winter. Read more
items.author: Leslie Aucoin

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice but very long
items.body: I loved this top, sadly it was too long for me. Not really made for the short torso people. Read more
items.author: Kimberly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars What's not to love?! Best ever!
items.body: This is my new go-to long sleeve for 1) as a staple to wear alone or with a jacket 2) as an undershirt or base layer 3) as a cool weather jogging tee 4) as a pj top with pajama bottoms. I love it because of the modest hem and neckline design, it's tailored without being body conscious, it's soo soft and warm, it launders well and does not shrink, the light colors are not see-thru, and it is so slimming. I now have it in 6 colors. I wish it came in Christmas red and different stripe combos (blk and wht, navy and wht ... ) (hint, hint) Also wish the short and sleeveless tees were made from this fabric. That aside, get yours today! You won't be sorry! I'm 5'3, 150 lbs, 40 inch bust, 36 DD, size 10 top / 4-6 bottom and I got a Medium. I would say they are true to size with a slight loose fit. If you want tighter fitting then size down. Read more
items.author: Karen D. McConnico

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute and comfortable
items.body: I love this tunic since it is so soft, stretchy and comfortable. It is a nice weight for cool summer days, fall and winter. I am 5' 2" and 125 lbs. the medium size and it fits perfect, not too tight and not too loose. Although the medium would not work for layering on me since there is not enough room but I didn't plan on layering anyway. The cut is very flattering. My only disappointment is the color - the heather blue is not as blue as it is on-line, it is a combination of the heather blue and the heather grey, but I love it anyway. Read more
items.author: Cyndi

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars This shirt is so-so
items.body: Shirt is just ok. Does fit true to size, so if you want a longer cut on your butt, size up. It’s also not a flowy or clingy material. It’s kinda like a thick cotton tshirt with long sleeves. It lays stiff imo. Lastly, and this should be a standard when writing a review for clothing, this shows sweat marks. So if you’re a sweater or don’t use antiperspirant in your deodorant, don’t buy this. Read more
items.author: Bad to the bone

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shirt
items.body: Perfect fit. Soft. Love the length. Read more
items.author: Melissa Bordfeld

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very soft and comfortable!
items.body: Great material, true to size and just the right length to wear with leggings. Read more
items.author: C. Jones

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Split is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Heather Coffee, Light Coffee, Burgundy Red, Deep Coffee, Apricot, Dusty Green, Coffee, Navy Blue, 0-black, Dusty Rose, Heather White, Heather Blue, 0-white, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
